none: Scale approximately 1:780,000 ; (W 4°46'-- W 3°04'/N 53°42'-- N 52°25'). ; Relief shown pictorially.; Includes illustrations of a sea monster in ocean and fruit around the title cartouche.; Coordinates given as (E 16°25'-- E °21'50"/N 53°42'-- N 52°25').; Scale given in Miliaria Anglicana and Miliaria Germanica.; Appears in a Latin edition of Abraham Ortelius's: Theatrum orbis terrarum, published in various editions between 1570 and 1612. No page number on recto or verso of map. Caption on verso is "Cambria, siue VVallia". ; Place names in Latin, English and Welsh; Latin text on verso.
Northwestern University Libraries Digital Collections API
Homepage at Northwestern University Libraries Digital Collections
Northwestern University Libraries’ Map & Atlas Collection allows access to an ever-growing selection of our cartographic resources in high resolution.
